content:
Wow, Claude. I’m in bed now but couldn’t help myself, checked in on the machine and will be here Friday night. Here are the specs, let me know what this enables us to do differently when you can access this machine. 

This is what I got that you determined was best for timeline and objectives a week ago within my financial constraints. What do you think?

THELIO MIRA PREMIUM

Was: $2,182.00
Now: $1,999.00
Description
Tech Specs
Performance for the pros backed by quiet, effective cooling—a great value that proves its worth in any professional setting.

Thelio Mira Premium comes configured with:

12-core AMD Ryzen 9 9900X CPU
64GB DDR5 RAM (4800MHz)
1TB PCIe 5.0 SSD storage
AMD Radeon RX 7600 graphics
Features:

	Swappable accent panel		Peak-performance airflow
	Open source hardware		US-manufactured
 

Great for

Creative professionals
STEM & Machine learning
1080p Gaming
Accent Color: Walnut
Selected Accent Color is Walnut
  
  
  
  
 
Operating System:
Pop!_OS 22.04 LTS with full disk-encryption Ubuntu 22.04 LTS Ubuntu 24.04 LTS
Warranty:
1 Year Limited Parts and Labor Warranty 2 Year Limited Parts and Labor Warranty +$149 3 Year Limited Parts and Labor Warranty +$249
WiFi and Bluetooth:
Built-in WiFi 7 + Bluetooth 5.4 Disable WiFi + Bluetooth Capability
